page.title: 06LEISURE AND ENTERTAINMENT(b)
page.content: The young housewife informed us that for the young ie below teenagers, there is an after school club where the children can play games. There is a Youth Club held in the chapel where discos are held regularly about three times per week.The nearest centre for the teenagers entertainment is in Mansfield where disco and ballroom dancing take place. There is a ladies keep fit club in the disused chapel on Tuesday afternoons. There is a move by Mansfield Council to encourage clubs and leisure activities in the area. During the summer holiday at the park there is an employed leader who organises the children to play games. There is a centre at the local primary school for the young in the early evenings where organised games are played.The village has its own Jazz Band which competes during the summer.
